name: Fling with a Tiefling
storyline: Fling with a Tiefling follows Nox, the leader of an adventuring group whose journey is about to come to an end. As they think about their future and all the feelings that come with it, they are joined by their lovely companion, Karrus. The player and him talk about the future, and confess to one another, and depending on player choices, the night can end one of two ways.
summary: Fling with a Tiefling is a short fantasy romance visual novel that follows you, an adventurer whose journey is about to come to an end. With tonight potentially being the last night with your treasured Tiefling companion Karrus, how will you spend it with him?
